column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Taking the train is an efficient method of transportation to get from place to place .
#id=2
#text=Before taking the train , I will make sure my transit card has enough fare on it .
#id=3
#text=This can be checked at the ticketing machines .
#id=4
#text=If I am low , I will top-up the card with more money .
#id=5
#text=Once this is all set , I will head towards the gate to scan my transit card .
#id=6
#text=The gates will open and the fare will be collected .
#id=7
#text=Usually I already know where I need to go , but in case I do not know .
#id=8
#text=I will check the many maps posted around the station .
#id=9
#text=Knowing which direction the train heads towards is the most important thing as you do n't want to waste time going the wrong way .
#text=Once this is determined , I will head towards the train platform and wait until the train arrives .
#text=Once the train is here , I am all set and I will board the train and get off at my destination .
